title: ESET NOD32 Anitvirus Business Edition 3.0.621 plus Best V3 Fix
description:
Reload this one since it works perfectly. Follow instructions precisely:



-=Instructions=-

1) Install included ESET NOD32 Antivirus 3.0.621 Business Edition, 
   or Get and install the Eset NOD32 Antivirus or Smart Security v3.x at www.ESET.com ;

2) Install this FiX and restart your computer;

3) Very Important: change the Update server to "Choose automatically", as below:
	           Setup-->Toggle Advanced Mode/Enter entire advanced setup tree
	                -->Update-->Update Server
	                 =>Chose automatically -- OK
	
    
3) Update the virus definitions;

	[ 4)  Verify the remaining trial period, if downloaded from ESET - 
	      The license expires in 5th.Jan.2050  ]

-=Notes=-
* Free Updates, directly from ESET update server...
* Tested in Eset NOD32 v3.0.621 Antivirus/Smart Security
  on WindowsXP/Vista-32bits
-------------------------------------------------------
TemDono (Brasil)
